## üëÄ Motivation [üîù](#-frontend-for-app-)

The frontend of Testimonial CMS is built with Next.js, React, and TypeScript, delivering a modern, fast, and scalable interface for managing and displaying testimonials. It leverages Tailwind CSS and Shadcn/ui for a clean and cohesive design, while Zustand handles global state management in a lightweight and predictable way. Zod is used for data validation, and JSON Web Tokens (JWT) manage authentication. Additionally, PostCSS, ESLint, and Prettier ensure clean, accessible, and maintainable code, providing a smooth experience for both administrators and end users.

## üõ†Ô∏è Run Locally [üîù](#-frontend-for-app-)

üëâüèª To use locally Ruta Dorada, you need to:

Clone our repository

```sh
git clone https://github.com/No-Country-simulation/s17-16-t-node-react.git
```

Move into frontend folder and install dependencies

```sh
cd frontend | pnpm i
```

Run the project locally of the frontend

```sh
pnpm dev
```

## üéöÔ∏è Scripts [üîù](#-frontend-for-app-)

- `pnpm start`: Run the application preview production client with next.
- `pnpm dev`: Run the application development client with next.
- `pnpm build`: Builds the production bundle for the web application.
- `pnpm lint`: Linting errors in the codebase automatically.
